content_text:
Ornament of perception // At the moment when sun was going down and I was finishing my weekend getting ready for new work week, I looked through the window and decided to take my old camera for a small experiment. I had set the exposure time for 1 second and slightly waved the camera to the city that was preparing for itâ€™s evening affairs. That is how appeared the cover for my DIY music release which is called Ornament of Perception. 

https://ross-savchyn.bandcamp.com/
